text: Gil Jae or Kil Jae (1353 1419) was a Korean scholar, politician, educator, and poet. == Works == * Yaeunjip (야은집, 冶隱集) * Yaeuneonhaengseubyu (야은언행습유, 冶隱言行拾遺) * Yaeunsokjip (야은속집, 冶隱續集) ==Related pages== * Jeong Do-jeon * Jeong Mong-ju == Other websites == * http://100.naver.com/100.nhn?docid=30262 * http://terms.naver.com/entry.nhn?docId=688666 * http://terms.naver.com/entry.nhn?docId=551587 Category:1353 births Category:1419 deaths Category:Korean educators Category:Korean politicians Category:Korean writers
title: Gil Jae
